Description.Text: The 4.5-star Rydges Parramatta Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Sydney. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out are readily available for you to enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, desk. Take a break from a long day and make use of fitness center, sauna, golf course (within 3 km), indoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Rydges Parramatta Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Sydney.
